{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3526894,"name":"Emma","username":"hello03","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/hello03/{size}/195990_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-14T10:55:28.577Z","cooked":"

Hi, I’m from team 5987 and we’re trying to use Path Planner’s path find command for automation. Currently the path finding is dependent on the robot’s starting speed, if the path finding command is started with zero the robot moves at 0.01 meters per second. Here is a video of the problem:

We want to be able to start the path finding command from a static position.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2025-02-14T10:55:28.577Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":158,"reads":118,"readers_count":117,"score":858.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":491665,"topic_slug":"path-planner-path-finding-issue","display_username":"Emma","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YckzSJp-lMw","internal":false,"reflection":false,"clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55984,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5987|Programming lead"},"post_url":"/t/path-planner-path-finding-issue/491665/1","custom_user_title":"5987|Programming lead","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3526915,"name":"Luca Carvalho","username":"CarvalhoJeo","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/carvalhojeo/{size}/249007_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-14T12:01:37.484Z","cooked":"

Can you send how your pathfinding command is structured in code here?

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2025-02-14T12:01:37.484Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":112,"readers_count":111,"score":27.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":491665,"topic_slug":"path-planner-path-finding-issue","display_username":"Luca Carvalho","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":49147,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1156"},"post_url":"/t/path-planner-path-finding-issue/491665/2","custom_user_title":"1156","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3526992,"name":"Emma","username":"hello03","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/hello03/{size}/195990_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-14T14:06:45.032Z","cooked":"

This is the path find command in our github

github.com

Galaxia5987/robot-2025/blob/feature/align-command/src/main/kotlin/frc/robot/subsystems/drive/DriveCommands.java#L328


      
    
          
  1. public static Command alignWithBestVisionTarget(
    2. 
          
  2.         Vision vision,
    3. 
          
  3.         Drive drive,
    4. 
          
  4.         int cameraIndex,
    5. 
          
  5.         DoubleSupplier ySupplier,
    6. 
          
  6.         DoubleSupplier xSupplier) {
    7. 
          
  7.     return joystickDriveAtAngle(
    8. 
          
  8.             drive, ySupplier, xSupplier, () -> vision.getYawToTarget(cameraIndex));
    9. 
          
  9. }
    10. 
          
  10. 
          
  11. public static Command alignToPose(Pose2d pose) {
    12. 
          
  12.     return Commands.defer(
    13. 
          
  13.             () -> AutoBuilder.pathfindToPose(pose, TunerConstants.PATH_CONSTRAINTS, 0.0),
    14. 
          
  14.             Set.of(frc.robot.InitializerKt.getSwerveDrive()));
    15. 
          
  15. }
    16. 
          
  16. 
          
  17. private static class WheelRadiusCharacterizationState {
    18. 
          
  18.     double[] positions = new double[4];
    19. 
          
  19.     Rotation2d lastAngle = new Rotation2d();
    20. 
          
  20.     double gyroDelta = 0.0;
    21. 
          
  21. }
    22.

And these are the path constraints:

github.com

Galaxia5987/robot-2025/blob/feature/align-command/src/main/kotlin/frc/robot/subsystems/drive/TunerConstants.java#L359


      
    
          
  1.     kBackRightSteerMotorId = SwervePorts.REAR_RIGHT_ANGLE_MOTOR_ID;
    2. 
          
  2.     kBackRightEncoderId = SwervePorts.REAR_RIGHT_ENCODER_ID;
    3. 
          
  3.     kBackRightEncoderOffset = Radians.of(-offsets[3]);
    4. 
          
  4.     kBackRightSteerMotorInverted = true;
    5. 
          
  5.     kBackRightCANcoderInverted = false;
    6. 
          
  6. 
          
  7.     kBackRightXPos = Meters.of(-0.24);
    8. 
          
  8.     kBackRightYPos = Meters.of(-0.24);
    9. 
          
  9. }
    10. 
          
  10. 
          
  11. PATH_CONSTRAINTS =
    12. 
          
  12.         new PathConstraints(
    13. 
          
  13.                 kSpeedAt12Volts.in(MetersPerSecond),
    14. 
          
  14.                 kMaxAcceleration.in(MetersPerSecondPerSecond),
    15. 
          
  15.                 kMaxOmegaVelocity.in(RadiansPerSecond),
    16. 
          
  16.                 kMaxAngularAcceleration.in(RadiansPerSecondPerSecond));
    17. 
          
  17. 
          
  18. DrivetrainConstants =
    19. 
          
  19.         new SwerveDrivetrainConstants()
    20. 
          
  20.                 .withCANBusName(kCANBus.getName())
    21. 
          
  21.                 .withPigeon2Id(kPigeonId)
    22.

And the auto builder config:

github.com

Galaxia5987/robot-2025/blob/feature/align-command/src/main/kotlin/frc/robot/subsystems/drive/Drive.java#L188


      
    
          
  1. modules[3] = new Module(brModuleIO, 3, TunerConstants.BackRight);
    2. 
          
  2. 
          
  3. // Usage reporting for swerve template
    4. 
          
  4. HAL.report(
    5. 
          
  5.         tResourceType.kResourceType_RobotDrive, tInstances.kRobotDriveSwerve_AdvantageKit);
    6. 
          
  6. 
          
  7. // Start odometry thread
    8. 
          
  8. PhoenixOdometryThread.getInstance().start();
    9. 
          
  9. 
          
  10. // Configure AutoBuilder for PathPlanner
    11. 
          
  11. AutoBuilder.configure(
    12. 
          
  12.         this::getPose,
    13. 
          
  13.         this::resetOdometry,
    14. 
          
  14.         this::getChassisSpeeds,
    15. 
          
  15.         this::runVelocity,
    16. 
          
  16.         new PPHolonomicDriveController(
    17. 
          
  17.                 new PIDConstants(10.0, 0.0, 0.0), new PIDConstants(10.0, 0.0, 0.0)),
    18. 
          
  18.         PP_CONFIG,
    19. 
          
  19.         () -> DriverStation.getAlliance().orElse(Alliance.Blue) == Alliance.Red,
    20. 
          
  20.         this);
    21. 
          
  21. Pathfinding.setPathfinder(new LocalADStarAK());
    22.

Hello, I’m having the exact same issue. Did you ever figure out how to make it work? Thanks!

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2025-05-24T16:39:04.937Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":51,"readers_count":50,"score":15.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":491665,"topic_slug":"path-planner-path-finding-issue","display_username":"Carter","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":69500,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1710 Mech, Programming"},"post_url":"/t/path-planner-path-finding-issue/491665/4","custom_user_title":"1710 Mech, Programming","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3635400,"name":"Emma","username":"hello03","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/hello03/{size}/195990_2.png","created_at":"2025-05-25T07:09:37.500Z","cooked":"

The max speed in the path planner app was configured too low so the calculated possible acceleration was zero or really close to it so the path following always stayed with the initial speed. Hope this helps!
